casebody.data:
No. 211,

Mise.

Conway v. California Adult Authority et al. Thomas C. Lynch, Attorney General of California, Albert W. Harris, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, and George R. Nock, Deputy Attorney General, for respondents.

C. A. 9th Cir. Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted and case transferred to appellate docket.
